website_summaries.verdict: A versatile robotic cleaner with good cleaning ability but a smaller mopping area.
pros: Users praise this model for being powerful, quiet, and cleaning well
Although the mopping area is smaller than some other models, users give it high marks for its ability to scrub stubborn dirty spots on hard floors
cons: Tends to have some issues with navigation and finding the docking station
A few users also report units breaking after less than a year

customer_reviews.title: Not an independent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job picking up pet hair and sand. However, it requires much more supervision than I would have thought necessary. Seems it is always getting hung up on edges of rugs or under chairs. Will not clean under the toe kick space in the kitchen so that is a problem. I just don’t like it as much as I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Driver

customer_reviews.title: Good robot
customer_reviews.text: Works good a little bit more noisy than I thought it would be. Gets stuck sometimes. But overall I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Bought this one for my daughter and Bob is also her boyfriend now!
customer_reviews.text: Let's us have a relaxing moment while Bob cleans :)
customer_reviews.author: Terynna G. Willhoit

customer_reviews.title: It's not very intuitive in how it cleans and will ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not very intuitive in how it cleans and will sort of wander aimlessly. It also has an issue getting stuck on a 2 millimeter separator piece. That said, it cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alea Iacta Est

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and hard to clean dust Ben. Only thing good is the color
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and hard to clean dust Ben. Only good thing about it was the red color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Diane McCall

customer_reviews.title: I dont know what I would do without BOB!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bob! He is the best! I have had mine for a year and he got sick so the company told me to send him into the "hospital" for a check up. We just moved into our new home a year ago. I purchased Bob because we have brand new wood floors and we have two dog, a lab & a chihuahua. Once he stopped workng i was amazed as to how quickly the floor was covered with dog hair. He has since been fixed and returned to us as healthy as when we first got hm. He runs everyday cleaning our wood floors and rugs
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Bob's a beast on pet hair
customer_reviews.text: My Bob sweep is a beast. I have 2 shedding dogs and he runs about an hour and half on a charge he gets deep in carpet . On hardwood floors Bob cruises right through the dust, hair and dirt and when I look at my socks no hair on them.got to watch out for bugs I pick them up or Bob will try to suck them up it's that powerful .had Bob for about 6 months still love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob Rocks!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I have 3 animals and they constantly shed. Bob cleans every day and I only have to mop occasionally. Dusting is much less also. The customer service for this company is the best I have ever worked with. A+ all the way around!!
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to regularly clean its wheels
customer_reviews.text: Bobsweep cleans great! Just be cafeful what’s left on the floor, mine vacuumed up a AA battery! As long as you regularly clean the wheels and dump the debris bin, it’s trouble free
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Price

customer_reviews.title: Great against dog fur and sand!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bobsweep. I have two large German Sheppard mixes and does very well keeping up with them. Does amazing against dog fur. It gets up things my other cleaning supplies misses. Only downside is you have to clean its wheels about once a week but its fur. Fur is a pain anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Williamson

customer_reviews.title: four stars will have to do!
customer_reviews.text: I would say Bob works pretty good, but you do have to make some concisions so that he has a clear path around your house, I'd give him a 5 star but he's not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Meeker

customer_reviews.title: BEST vacuum EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my Bob. I have a couple of dogs and do vacuum all the time, but when I get home from work I am so excited to see the Bob Maid has come and cleaned my house. My dog hates vacuums but this one is pretty quiet, so it doesn't bother him. Every time it finishes, I clean out the dirt bin and it's full. It covers all the corners and under furniture. I can't say enough about this product. This is the best thing I have bought myself, ever. It's so good that I told my sister about it and she bought one too. We love it! Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bob is my left arm
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, and Bob has quite the challenge ahead of him. I’m pretty impressed with his vacuuming. No, not as good as what I do with an upright, but it is nice to use in between vacuums. Bob sometimes has a challenge with one of our area rugs, the pile is high. I have a Bob upstairs and downstairs, and he’s my buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: bObsweep PetHair Robotic Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, Rouge by bObsweep
product_meta.description: Bobsweep robotic vacuum cleaner with charging station and power adapter. No mop attachment.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars24 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
